overview: Tom Fuelling joined Hulu as CFO with more than twenty years of professional experience in finance, accounting and operations with growth-oriented companies in the media/entertainment and internet/technology industries. Tomâ€™s previous CFO experience includes Ascent Mediaâ€™s Network Services division, a $250M media services business that was part of Liberty Media; ARTISTdirect, Inc., a publicly-traded internet company; Sega Gameworks, a location-based entertainment company; and Village Roadshow Pictures, an independent filmed entertainment production company. Tom is a CPA and began his career at Price Waterhouse where he spent 9 years in Los Angeles and London. He received his Bachelors of Science degree in Business Administration from the University of Southern California and his M.B.A. from the Kellogg School of Management at Northwestern University. (Source : www.hulu.com)
